name: Templar 2
description:
Join Ruy in his epic fight against the forces of evil, guilty of unleashing the red plague on the darkest, most sinister, and bloodiest of the Middle Ages.

Each person killed by the disease becomes a terrible demon, and a mysterious army known as "The Knights of the Three Suns" terrorizes the villages in search of witches under the orders of Torquemada the Inquisitor.

Increase your level and find powerful equipment to be able to face a ruthless army of mercenaries, demons, monsters, witches, sorcerers, crusaders and soulless inquisitors, who will try to kill Ruy throughout more than 50 levels, on a map where you must find your way, as not all medieval lands are suitable for low-level knights.

A fast-paced story told with more than 30 pages of color comics, and animated scenes.

Templar 2 is compatible with most bluetooth controllers available for Android, you just have to activate the controller within the game options.

Texts available in Spanish and English.

Main features:

-Adventure platformer game with traditional 2D graphics.

-Very tight difficulty.

-Intuitive controls.

-Great variety of enemies.

-More than 50 levels.

-Animated scenes.

-A soundtrack as terrifying as it is rock.

-More than 30 pages of color comics.

-Texts available in Spanish and English.
